title: 1 Bed available near Davis Square
posting_body: Great location and spectacular view of Boston skyline!
###  looking for a roommate ###
A spacious and sunny bedroom, with view available in a 2 bed and 1 bath apt.
-  Great location, minutes from Davis Square, Porter Square, Teele Square.. also Harvard square is very close.
(Please check it in the map)
- Top Floor(9th floor)..noise won't come from above!!
- Large living room with balcony and mounted AC.
Also comes with ample storage space.
The bedrooms also has closet.
- Kitchen has dishwasher, stove and other necessary stuff
- Laundry by the entrance(coin/card operated)
- Electric heating
- No pets
- unfurnished
- Utilities(electric, wifi and other common stuff like paper towels etc etc)
- you won't have to share with many roommates, apt is very large for 2 people
- each room has it's own thermostat
I visited the apt twice to make sure everything, and also talked to the landlord.
landlord is very helpful.
Received positive feedback from current tenant (nice view of 4th of July fireworks)
your roommate(myself, in late 20's): I am a robotics engineer, currently work in seaport.
I have been living in Boston for last five years.
I am very neat, clean and respectful.
very active with outdoor activities hiking, cycling, gym, running and going out to restaurants.
I also travel once awhile.
I am looking for a respectful roommate who would like to live in a neat and clean shared household.
I have video of your room and common spaces.
if we decide to move forward, we can go and see the unit in person.
To secure the unit, you need to pay 1st and broker fees ($1350+$1350)
Please reach out with a brief description of yourself and what do you do!
